mapper.select: SELECT ChattingRoom_Number, IFNULL(COUNT(*), 0) as count FROM ChattingRoomCount GROUP BY ChattingRoom_Number ORDER BY ChattingRoom_Number = #{chat_number};
SELECT ChattingRoom_Number, COUNT(*) as count FROM ChattingRoomCount GROUP BY ChattingRoom_Number ORDER BY ChattingRoom_Number DESC;
mapper.insert: insert into ChattingRoom (ChattingRoom_Password, ChattingRoom_Number, ChattingRoom_TITLE, ChattingRoom_Create_Date, ChattingRoom_region) values(#{chat_password},#{chat_number},#{chat_title},now(),#{chat_region});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ChattingRoom ORDER BY ChattingRoom_Number DESC;
